input.sentences: [male] likes to draw art in the snow .
this way he does n't damage things because it melts and goes away .
here he is making a zebra .
and here he is drawing a man .
here he is thinking of someone while drawing .
output.sentences: The gang drew a lot of graffiti.
Some of the members were better at it than others.
They went through a lot of black spray paint.
Some of their paintings were graphic.
